block-node.description: Whether the node occupies a row

default-expand-all.description: Whether to expand the parent node by default

checkable.type: boolean| (( node: TreeNodeData, info: { level: number; isLeaf: boolean; } ) => boolean)
checkable.description: Whether to add a checkbox in front of the node, the function format is supported from 2.27.0 onwards
checkable.description_zh: 是否在节点前添加复选框，从 2.27.0 开始支持函数格式

selectable.type: boolean| (( node: TreeNodeData, info: { level: number; isLeaf: boolean; } ) => boolean)
selectable.description: Whether or not to support selection, the function format is supported from 2.27.0 onwards
selectable.description_zh: 是否支持选择，从 2.27.0 开始支持函数格式

check-strictly.description: Whether to disassociate the parent-child node
check-strictly.description_zh: 是否取消父子节点关联

checked-strategy.description: Custom backfill method all: Returns all selected nodes parent: Returns only the parent node when both parent and child nodes are selected child: Only child nodes are returned
checked-strategy.description_zh: 定制回填方式  all: 返回所有选中的节点  parent: 父子节点都选中时只返回父节点  child: 只返回子节点

:default-selected-keys.description: The tree node is selected by default

:default-checked-keys.description: By default, a tree node with the checkbox selected
:default-checked-keys.description_zh: 默认选中复选框的树节点

v-model:checked-keys.description: Select the tree node with the check box

default-expanded-keys.description: The node that expands by default

:data.description: Enter data to generate the corresponding tree structure
:data.description_zh: 传入data,生成对应的树结构

:field-names.description: Specify the name of the field in the node data
:field-names.description_zh: 指定节点数据中的字段名

show-line.description: Whether or not to display the connection line

:load-more.description: A callback that loads data asynchronously and returns a Promise
:load-more.description_zh: 异步加载数据的回调，返回一个 Promise

draggable.description: Whether it is possible to drag and drop

:allow-drop.description: Whether to allow the release on a node when dragging
:allow-drop.description_zh: 拖拽时是否允许在某节点上释放

:virtual-list-props.description: Pass the virtual list property, pass this parameter to enable virtual scrolling, VirtualListProps
:virtual-list-props.description_zh: 传递虚拟列表属性，传入此参数以开启虚拟滚动，VirtualListProps

default-expand-selected.description: Whether to expand the parent node of the selected node by default
default-expand-selected.description_zh: 是否默认展开已选中节点的父节点

default-expand-checked.description: Whether to expand the parent node of the checkbox node by default
default-expand-checked.description_zh: 是否默认展开已选中复选框节点的父节点

auto-expand-parent.description: Whether to automatically expand the parent node of the expanded node
auto-expand-parent.description_zh: 是否自动展开已展开节点的父节点

v-model:half-checked-keys.description: Nodes in a half-selected state. Takes effect only when checkable and checkStrictly is available
v-model:half-checked-keys.description_zh: 半选状态的节点.仅在 checkable 且 checkStrictly 时生效

animation.description: Whether to enable the transition animation when expanding
animation.description_zh: 是否开启展开时的过渡动效

:action-on-node-click.description: An action that is triggered when a node is clicked
:action-on-node-click.description_zh: 点击节点的时候触发的动作

methods.name: scrollIntoView
methods.description: A virtual list scrolls through an element
methods.params: options: { index?: number; key?: number | string; align: 'auto' | 'top' | 'bottom'}
methods.description_zh: 虚拟列表滚动某个元素

methods.name: getCheckedNodes
methods.description: Gets the node with the checkbox selected. The checkedStrategy can be passed in, and the configuration of the component is not passed.
methods.description_zh: 获取选中复选框的节点。支持传入 checkedStrategy，没有传则取组件的配置。

methods.name: getHalfCheckedNodes
methods.description: Gets the node with the checkbox half selected
methods.description_zh: 获取复选框半选的节点

methods.name: checkAll
methods.description: Sets the checkbox status for all nodes
methods.description_zh: 设置全部节点的复选框状态

methods.name: checkNode
methods.description: Sets the checkbox status of the specified node
methods.description_zh: 设置指定节点的复选框状态

methods.name: selectAll
methods.description: Sets the selected status of all nodes
methods.description_zh: 设置全部节点的选中状态

methods.name: selectNode
methods.description: Sets the selected status of the specified node
methods.description_zh: 设置指定节点的选中状态

methods.name: expandAll
methods.description: Sets the expansion status of all nodes
methods.description_zh: 设置全部节点的展开状态

methods.name: expandNode
methods.description: Sets the expansion status of the specified node
methods.description_zh: 设置指定节点的展开状态

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when a tree node is clicked
events.params: selectedKeys: Array<string | number>data: { selected?: boolean; selectedNodes: TreeNodeData[]; node?: TreeNodeData; e?: Event; }

events.name: check
events.description: Triggered when the tree node checkbox is clicked. halfCheckedKeys and halfCheckedNodes are supported since 2.19.0.
events.description_zh: 点击树节点复选框时触发。halfCheckedKeys 和 halfCheckedNodes 从 2.19.0 开始支持。
events.params: checkedKeys: Array<string | number>data: { checked?: boolean; checkedNodes: TreeNodeData[]; node?: TreeNodeData; e?: Event; halfCheckedKeys: (string | number)[]; halfCheckedNodes: TreeNodeData[]; }

events.name: expand
events.params: expandKeys: Array<string | number>data: { expanded?: boolean; expandNodes: TreeNodeData[]; node?: TreeNodeData; e?: Event; }

events.name: drag-end
events.description: Drag and drop at the end of the node

events.name: drag-over
events.description: The node is dragged to the disposable target
events.description_zh: 节点被拖拽至可释放目标

events.name: drag-leave
events.description: The node leaves the disposable target

events.name: drop
events.description: The node is released on the disposable target
events.description_zh: 节点在可释放目标上释放
events.params: data: { e: DragEvent; dragNode: TreeNodeData; dropNode: TreeNodeData; dropPosition: number; }

TreeNodeData.name: isLeaf
TreeNodeData.description: 是否是叶子节点。动态加载时有效

TreeNodeData.name: switcherIcon
TreeNodeData.description: 定制 switcher 图标，优先级大于 tree

TreeNodeData.name: loadingIcon
TreeNodeData.description: 定制 loading 图标，优先级大于 tree

TreeNodeData.name: dragIcon
TreeNodeData.description: 定制 drag 图标，优先级大于 tree

TreeFieldNames.name: key
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 key 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: title
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 title 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: disabled
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 disabled 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: children
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 children 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: isLeaf
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 isLeaf 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: disableCheckbox
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 disableCheckbox 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: checkable
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 checkable 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

TreeFieldNames.name: icon
TreeFieldNames.description: 指定 icon 在 TreeNodeData 中的字段名

VirtualListProps.name: threshold
VirtualListProps.description: 开启虚拟滚动的元素数量阈值，当数据数量小于阈值时不会开启虚拟滚动。

VirtualListProps.name: isStaticItemHeight
VirtualListProps.description: （已废除）元素高度是否是固定的。2.34.1 版本废除，请使用 fixedSize

VirtualListProps.name: fixedSize
VirtualListProps.description: 元素高度是否是固定的。

VirtualListProps.name: estimatedSize
VirtualListProps.description: 元素高度不固定时的预估高度。

VirtualListProps.name: buffer
VirtualListProps.description: 视口边界外提前挂载的元素数量。
